name: Flappy Chicken: The Bird Who Wished to Fly
name_original: Flappy Chicken: The Bird Who Wished to Fly
description:
The Bird Who Wished to Fly is the ultimate impossible chicken flying simulation farm animal pandemic that's taking over the world! Save the earth one chicken at a time by soaring over the most ferocious farm animals ever!
Good luck flying the farthest!
Super simple controls but an army of deadly farm animals!
Only 3 flaps to save the world!
WARNING: Savage animal sounds may occur!
